databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID , OD_JRY.STATUS , OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID , OD_JRY.JRY_DATE , OD_JRY.JRY_NO , OD_JRY.AMOUNT , OD_JRY.NEBIKI_AMOUNT , OD_JRY.TAX , OD_JRY.KAMOKU_NO , OD_JRY.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , OD_JRY.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY.DATA_NO , OD_JRY.USER_KEY , OD_JRY.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY.TS ,
MS_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_NAME as MS_CUSTOMER_CUSTOMER_NAME, OD_MK.NOUKI as OD_MK_NOUKI , OD_THI.THI_IRAI_DATE as OD_THI_THI_IRAI_DATE , OD_THI.NAIYOU as OD_THI_NAIYOU , OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID , MS_USER.SEI || ' ' || MS_USER.MEI as MS_USER_THI_USER_NAME, OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID as OD_THI_MS_VESSEL_ID, OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID as OD_THI_MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID, OD_THI.JIM_TANTOU_ID as OD_THI_JIM_TANTOU_ID, OD_THI.OD_THI_ID ,
OD_THI.TEHAI_IRAI_NO, OD_MM.MM_NO, OD_MK.MK_NO
,OD_JRY.CARRIAGE
#APPEND_COLUMN_STR#
FROM OD_JRY
INNER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID = OD_MK.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MK.OD_MM_ID = OD_MM.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_MM.OD_THI_ID = OD_THI.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_CUSTOMER ON OD_MK.MS_CUSTOMER_ID = MS_CUSTOMER.MS_CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_USER ON OD_THI.THI_USER_ID = MS_USER.MS_USER_ID
#APPEND_JOIN_STR#
WHERE OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY OD_THI.TEHAI_IRAI_NO, OD_MM.MM_NO, OD_MK.MK_NO, OD_JRY.JRY_NO
ORDER BY TEHAI_IRAI_NO, MM_NO, MK_NO, JRY_NO
AND OD_THI.OD_THI_ID = :OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND OD_MM.OD_MM_ID = :OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
INNER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID = OD_MK.OD_MK_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
INNER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID

LEFT JOIN OD_SHR ON OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_SHR.STATUS = 0 LEFT JOIN OD_GAISAN_KEIJO ON OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID INNER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID
LEFT JOIN OD_GAISAN_KEIJO ON OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID INNER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID

and OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID != :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD INNER JOIN OD_SHR ON OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_ID AND OD_SHR.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 WHERE OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM_ID FROM OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM INNER JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID = OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID AND OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_SHR ON OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_ID AND OD_SHR.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 WHERE OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID)

AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_SHR WHERE OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_SHR.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI )

SELECT OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID , OD_JRY.STATUS , OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID , OD_JRY.JRY_DATE , OD_JRY.JRY_NO , OD_JRY.AMOUNT , OD_JRY.NEBIKI_AMOUNT , OD_JRY.TAX , OD_JRY.KAMOKU_NO , OD_JRY.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , OD_JRY.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY.DATA_NO , OD_JRY.USER_KEY , OD_JRY.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY.TS ,OD_JRY.CARRIAGE
FROM OD_JRY WHERE OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID

INSERT INTO OD_JRY ( OD_JRY_ID , STATUS , CANCEL_FLAG , OD_MK_ID , JRY_DATE , JRY_NO , AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX , KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ,CARRIAGE ) VALUES ( :OD_JRY_ID , :STATUS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :OD_MK_ID , :JRY_DATE , :JRY_NO , :AMOUNT , :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , :TAX , :KAMOKU_NO , :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS ,:CARRIAGE )

UPDATE OD_JRY SET STATUS = :STATUS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , OD_MK_ID = :OD_MK_ID , JRY_DATE = :JRY_DATE , JRY_NO = :JRY_NO , AMOUNT = :AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT = :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX = :TAX , KAMOKU_NO = :KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO = :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS ,CARRIAGE = :CARRIAGE
WHERE OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID AND TS = :TS
